plot: Lucrecia has overcome breast cancer, but not the loneliness she has been suffering for some time. The arrival of a stranger in her life shows her that there are wounds that cannot heal alone.
title: La herida de Lucrecia
plot_es: Lucrecia has overcome breast cancer, but not the loneliness she has been suffering for some time. The arrival of a stranger in her life shows her that there are wounds that cannot heal alone.
plot_en: Lucrecia has overcome breast cancer, but not the loneliness she has been suffering for some time. The arrival of a stranger in her life shows her that there are wounds that cannot heal alone.
